# Act Without Thought (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
**Act Without Thought (Su):** As an immediate action the ninja may act in a surprise round she would not normally act in, and stops being [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]]. The ninja gains a +4 bonus to her initiative check. Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Options Power of the Ninja (Super Genius Games), pg. 2
